name: Q-Bot
description:
Welcome to Q-Bot!

Battle the waves of cute little robots and get ALL the Golden Scraps if you can. 

Instructions:

MOVE  WITH  W,A,S,D

SHOOT  WITH  LEFT  CLICK

COLLECT  SCRAP  AND  LEVEL-UP  YOUR  HEALTH  BAR

GET  POWER  UPS  TO  SURVIVE  THE  ENEMY  WAVES

BEAT  THE  LEVELS  IN  RECORD  TIME  AND  GET  THE  GOLDEN  SCRAPS

GOOD LUCK!
